function.name: directory.create
function.description: Creates a new directory (folder) in the workspace.

directory_name.description: The name of the directory to create. Can be a path like 'project/new_folder'.

function.name: directory.delete
function.description: Deletes a directory and all files and subdirectories within it. This is permanent and cannot be undone.

directory_name.description: The name of the directory to delete.

function.name: directory.tree
function.description: Shows a tree view of all files and directories in the **local workspace on disk**. Use this to explore and find **local project folders** and their contents. For projects hosted remotely on GitHub, use `github.list_my_repositories`. Can specify a starting path and depth.

path.description: The relative path to start listing from. Defaults to the root '.'

max_depth.description: The maximum depth to display. Use -1 for unlimited.
